project-inspiration: Before I go to sleep, I like to turn off the lights in my room, but often I am too lazy to walk to the other side of my room and turn them off. As a result, using an Arduino UNO, a relay, an IR receiver, and power strip, I created a power outlet that would be connected to my Arduino using a relay and controlled the Arduino via an IR Blaster. Now whenever I plug an electrical item into my strip, I can control it using a remote with buttons programmed to turn the item on or off.
project-subtitle: I made a power strip that can be controlled via Wifi
